document_data.name: Harengon
document_data.mainbody: '''Harengons''' were a [[humanoid]] race resembling rabbits that originated from the [[Feywild]].
document_data.Description: Harengons were bipedal [[rabbit]]-like creatures with extended feet and prolonged ears. They had a variety of fur colorations. Harengons had keen senses and powerful legs. The harengons' main characteristic was their energized personalities and tightly wound up musculature ready to spring into action at any given moment.
document_data.Abilities:
Harengons were creatures native to the [[Feywild]] and were blessed with [[fey]] luck, keen senses, and precise footwork. Their powerful legs could propel them into impressive jumps, akin to a rabbit's hop.

With training, harengons were peerless snipers with the [[light crossbow]], able to hit targets that were {{SI|320|feet|long=yes}} away and behind cover.
document_data.Notable Harengons: * [[Clipper]], the adventurer who was cursed to wander from one realm to another, never to find a home.{{Cite comic/Dungeons & Dragons Annual 2022}}
